name: Idle Tap: Guns Tycoon Factory
description:
Do you think you can unlock all the guns?

Idle Shooting is a great time wasting idle game. You can play anywhere, anytime.

HOW TO PLAY:

1 - Tap your guns to shoot and collect money
2 - Buy new weapons to help build up your factory
3 - Upgrade guns up to level 500, improving their power and fire rate
4 - Collect Bonuses to improve either your fire rate or damage
5 - Check out the leaderboards and compare top levels against the world
6 - Unlimited levels and unique guns

Collect all weapons and become the best gun hoarder in Idle Shooting !
